url.description: URL to access more details about the deployment status.

id.description: Unique identifier for the deployment status.

node_id.description: Node identifier for the deployment status.

state.description: The state of the deployment status (e.g., success, failure, error, pending, in_progress, queued).

creator.description: Details about the user who created the deployment status.

description.description: Description provided for the deployment status.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the deployment status was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the deployment status was last updated.

deployment_url.description: URL to the deployment this status belongs to.

repository_url.description: URL of the repository where the deployment originated.

performed_via_github_app.description: Details about the GitHub App that performed the deployment.

repository.description: The repository where the deployment originated.

deployment_id.description: The ID of the parent deployment.
